description.value:
The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll [[/r 1d12]] twice and consult the following list:

1

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Grip]

2

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blur]

3

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gecko Grip]

4

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Humanoid Form]

5

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Object]

6

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Laughing Fit]

7

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Noise Blast]

8

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]

9

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.See the Unseen]

10

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shatter]

11

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shrink]

12

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Maneuver]

You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled the same number) as 2nd-rank divine innate spells
